column4: i have a laptop that has Windows 7 premium innstalled on it.  It is used  as a desktop replacement and has DRD-RW , wireeless networkiing  and I  use it primarily as a desktop computer.  Should I install the netbook version or the desktop version to get the most out of ubuntu as a dual boot system.  I wannt to use some of thhe multimedia applications and allso facilitate the playing of some of the older dos based FPS games thru their
I'd definatly go for the normal desktop version
i'm running 10.04 because I had problems with N networks and my intel wifi card in 10.10
